version_description:
- New challenge mode! Featuring the new-all elemental blocks
- New legendary gears
- Completing legendary collections will give you a Legendary gear level 10
- End game cash details screen will now display the artifact rarity
- Minor bug fixes

- 4 new challenge modes
- In-game memory optimization
- iOS9 support
- Minor bug fixes

- Major performance optimization
- Tablet mode is now available on all devices. Go to "Settings > Tablet Mode" to enjoy a 13 columns wide mode
- 4 new challenge modes
- Letter blocks won’t consume pick hits
- Minor bug fixes

- Play the new Advent calendar modes to get unique rewards
- 6 new characters
- All December long, the Memory game will give better rewards

- Fixed Advent Calendar button visibility issues
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes

version_name: 2.5.1: fixed "pink text" issue on some devicesAll March long

version_description:
If you are still experiencing application crash, please contact us at support@roofdog.ca

- Minor bug fixes

*** Please, do not update. There is a font issue. A fix is coming.

All March long, we celebrate the 1st anniversary of Pocket Mine 2!

- 1 new adventure island
- 1 new character. Meet the powerful Andy!
- From March 1st to March 31st discover new Events every day!
- New gear
- A new St. Patricks event is coming. Don’t miss it!
- Minor bug fixes

If you are still experiencing application crash, please contact us at support@roofdog.ca

Version 2.5.1: fixed "pink text" issue on some devices

All March long, we celebrate the 1st anniversary of Pocket Mine 2!

- 1 new adventure island
- 1 new character. Meet the powerful Andy!
- From March 1st to March 31st discover new Events every day!
- New gear
- A new St. Patricks event is coming. Don’t miss it!
- Minor bug fixes

If you are still experiencing application crash, please contact us at support@roofdog.ca

- Improvements to cloud saving
- Fixed Museum collection count
- Fixed 'No effects' label on some cards
- Minor bug fixes

If you are still experiencing application crash, please contact us at support@roofdog.ca

Fixed the Game Center crash

Thanks for playing!

Please report any bug or issue to support@roofdog.ca

Behind-the-scenes improvements and bug fixes.

Thanks for playing!

Please report any bug or issue to support@roofdog.ca

- New adventure island (#34)
- Gas explosion delayed (makes it more powerful!!)
- Gear inventory is now limited to 500 items.
- Improved gear recycling filters
- Improved search filters in Museum

Thanks for playing!

Please report any bug or issue to support@roofdog.ca

- Increased gear limit to 1000. Use the new options to batch recycle your gear!
- Fixed adventure islands that were randomly unlocked

Thanks for playing!
